article_title: Thanks To The Courts, Medicare's Long-Term Care Program Has Become A Profound Fiscal Liability

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: BY VICTORIA PHLLIPS: In early July Medicare trustees released their annual report card and, to much surprise, Medicare costs were less than projected by a welcome $80.5 billion.
